mapper.select: select wa.content from wx_article wa LEFT JOIN wx_kwd_resp wkr on wa.kw_id=wkr.kwd_id where wkr.account_id=#{userid} and wkr.kwd_name like CONCAT('%',#{content},'%') limit 1;
select wa.title,wa.description,wa.picurl,wa.url from wx_article wa LEFT JOIN wx_kwd_resp wkr on wa.kw_id=wkr.kwd_id where wkr.account_id=#{userid} and wkr.kwd_name like CONCAT('%',#{content},'%')
select kwd_id,kwd_name,article_type,update_time from wx_kwd_resp where account_id=#{userid};
select wa.title,wa.content,wkr.kwd_id,wkr.kwd_name,wkr.article_type,wkr.update_time from wx_article wa left join wx_kwd_resp wkr on wa.kw_id=wkr.kwd_id where wkr.kwd_id=#{kwd_id} limit 1;
mapper.update: update wx_article set content=#{content} where kw_id=#{kwd_id}
update wx_article set kw_id=#{kwd_id} where article_id=#{article_id};
